name: CompanionShip
description:
Embark on a short adventure with Chicken and SOLUS!

My first official game ever! This game is definitely inspired by one of Sean's Bitsy game "rain." There are probably some bugs in there, but I tried polishing it up beforehand. The BGM is brought to you by Gacxy7. Anyways, enjoy!

*Made with Bitsy for the The Emotions & Feelings Jam
